Player History
Injured on 5/17/2001 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 3/1/2003 to a 1-year deal worth $1,200,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Colorado on 2/25/2004 to a 1-year deal worth $350,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Colorado on 3/1/2005 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 8/23/2005 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drafted in 7th round, 210th overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 2006...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Detroit on 7/24/2007 (Going to CHN: LF T. Valente. Going to DET: C B. Bennett)...
Released by Detroit on 5/9/2010...
Drafted in 2nd round, 36th overall pick, by Colorado in 2011...
Injured on 4/2/2011 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 6/3/2012 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 8/25/2012 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Traded from Colorado to San Francisco on 1/31/2014 (Going to COL: P E. Acosta. Going to SFN: P A. Conley)...
Traded from San Francisco to New York (A) on 2/27/2014 (Going to SFN: P J. Papelbon. Going to NYY: SS J. Crawford, P A. Conley, P J. Jackson)...
Traded from New York (A) to Los Angeles on 5/24/2014 (Going to NYY: 1B F. Freeman, 3B L. Morrison. Going to LA: 3B M. Olt, P A. Conley, CF M. Dupree, 1B J. Canning)...
Earned first career win on 7/23/2014...
Injured on 8/23/2016 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 4-5 weeks...
Won World Series with Los Angeles in 2018...
Drafted in 3rd round, 49th overall pick, by Detroit in 1977...
Injured on 8/7/1981 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 8/22/1982, off Tom Seaver (CAL)...
